daily_fact: Today in NYC: The Staten Island Half Marathon is set to inspire community spirit and promote health among local runners, showcasing resilience and unity.
topline_md: New York City braces for a cold and wet holiday weekend, while recent incidents include a Bronx building blaze injuring 12 and a fatal stabbing, alongside significant political developments as Attorney General Letitia James faces indictment amid ongoing mayoral race dynamics.

risks_alerts.title: Risks & Alerts
risks_alerts.summary_md:
### Risks & Alerts

- NYC and NJ brace for cold and wet weather this holiday weekend.
